website_summaries.verdict: This backpack is a good size and has a sturdy handle and wheels.
pros: Comes in several styles for girls and boys
Protective covering for wheels and bottom of the backpack
Made to take a beating at school or on the road
cons: This backpack rolls well, but can be a little heavy to wear

customer_reviews.title: High $ Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Lasted one month before extendable handle snapped. The handle is soda can thin. Avoid. Update - The manufacturer replaced for free. 5 stars for customer service.
customer_reviews.author: PAVB

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The bag looks even better in person. We haven’t taken it to school yet, but we have travelled with it and it packs a good amount of stuff, including a padded area for a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Returned

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, does the job for high school
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for school-my son just started high school with loads of books, folders and a laptop and this bag does the trick. Early days yet but great so far. I'd love the water bottle net holder to be slightly longer but it's ok. A better place to clip his lunch kit would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: KJ Ballard

customer_reviews.title: one of the best ones I found for the money
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Grandson. Very well made, one of the best ones I found for the money. Personally not to much into the camo blue but that's what he wanted. He's happy, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Susie, from SC

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space inside, I love it so much.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying a bookbag with rollers and I'm glad I got this. It's so spacious inside with many pockets. The bag is a lot bigger than I thought and it's perfect for a traveler like me.
customer_reviews.author: Jennit

customer_reviews.title: Love the Galaxy Rolling Backpack
customer_reviews.text: My college attending daughter needed a new backpack as the one we got her 3 years ago when she was still in high school finally gave up the ghost. She's had a rolling backpack for several years now and she likes how much sturdier this one feels compared to the J World rolling back pack that we replaced. She also likes that the zipper doesn't go all the way down to the bottom of the backpack as that feature always made the backpack fall over when it was unzipped all the way. She loves the Galaxy print. I got her a Tardis patch to put on the front pocket as she's a Whovian.
customer_reviews.author: VA Mom

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy and Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, durable. My 8 year old son can handle it well. Bright colors. Lots of useful pockets. A little heavy if you actually want to wear it with the straps (due to the solid construction of wheel section). That said, I like the option of the straps - though he doesn't use it that way.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Richards

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and cute. Very heavy duty. Has lasted through middle school with hardly any wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one! Purchased one in 2016 for my daughter and it lasted 2 years. They are very sturdy and is made of good material. My daughter loved her first and she'll love this one too
customer_reviews.author: Lola C.

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is amazing! There are so many different pockets and it can hold alot! Has a built in case for laptop, and tablets if you have one. This will be great for traveling! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lorna & sky

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not great
customer_reviews.text: The print on the backpack is awesome (space) BUT if you need to carry more than 2 books, a note pad, and a 3-inch binder look somewhere else. I was really hopeful that I could fit everything I needed for nursing school in it. It's no larger than a "normal" backpack. I gave it two stars only because it does have a few nice little pockets on the front and two mesh pockets on the side (even though they feel a little chintzy).
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap, rolls easily!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves this backpack. He started having back pain after his carry backpack became way too heavy. This was perfect for him, not cheap, rolls good.
customer_reviews.author: Long-Time Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My middle schooler shoulders were hurting from her heavy backpack. This backpack fits Her 2 text books, large binder, laptop, and has plenty of pockets for pencils...it has thick padded cushions on the back if you need to carry it. The cover Over the wheels is a plus. My child said her back and shoulder doesn’t hurt even when carrying it on her back because the sturdiness alleviates the pressure. The material of the handle is thin but it doesn’t wiggle or anything. I just have to remind her not to pick up the bag by the handlebar. Only had it for a few weeks now, so we’ll see if it last the rest of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This backpack gets banged around a lot.  And Still looks and works amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson uses the backpack to carry his computer to Remote Leaning, his Dad's House, his Mom's House and our House. Sometimes it gets rolled upside down, on it's side and hopefully right side up. Kids step on is in the classroom. It gets banged on the desk and walls. It takes a beating. There is lots of room for all his school supplies and laptop. It has lots of pockets for all his treasures. I am very happy with this backpack. I like how the wheels work and the telescope handle. Plus, everyone knows it is his because of the design on the bag. No worries about it getting taken accidentally.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lightsey

customer_reviews.title: This Galaxy wheeled backpack is outta this world!
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as shown. Very high quality in the design and it is crazy sturdy. My son has been really rough with it and it still looks brand new. Lots of space. Side nets hold medium size copper lined thermos easily. It does not flounder or flip, like so many cheaper brands out there. Color is rich and definitely not faded. My son loves this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Camden

customer_reviews.title: Love it but Not enough space and really pricey when purchased $85 currently is $66
customer_reviews.text: We would be completely satisfied since backpack does hold well , looks beautiful/colorful, nothing is broken , package was in good conditions , handle works well but it was a bit pricey and not everything fitted ...toolbox and reading book have to be carry on hand, only 2" binder,1 composition notebook and 1 book are the only items that fit on big zipper. We end up ordering another backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Cadillac of Roller Backpacks
customer_reviews.text: What more can I say. It’s the Cadillac of Rolling backpacks. It’s got all the bells and whistles and the material, fit and finish are superb. When you see your child rolling this bag and you see the rolling bags of their peers, you can definitely tell the difference. If paid for it then it should look it is my opinion. That’s one of the measures of value imo.
customer_reviews.author: Loco locust

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Not the cheapest, but it is good quality. My little daughter likes it and can easily manage it. I don't see why they didn't put any pencil case like in the other items of the same line, but in general good. I would update if anything comes up.
customer_reviews.author: Docs

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP HANDLE...
customer_reviews.text: Backpack is nice enough, but beware the super cheap plastic handle that will likely break the first time you pull a heavy load and have any kind of twisting motion (off a curb, for example). At this price, we went w LL Bean model instead, which has a much sturdier handle.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Miller

customer_reviews.title: Was hopeful but didn't meet our needs.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's backpack was so heavy I thought this was the cure! Not much more space than the full backpack and not very durable in quality. We had used it less than a week before I decided to return it. It was showing wear and minor damage after 3 days. Was hopeful. Maybe not a good match for middle school backpack needs, but I did love the design and structure. I might order one for myself if I needed one.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda Hargrove-Miller

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed for the money I paid
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old son uses this for school. We bought it because we wanted to have him roll his back pack due to the heavy books he needed to have for 5 th grade . He rolled the back pack down the stairs and the handle broke off. This was suppose to last him 2 years for the $85 dollars spent instead it hasn’t even been 2 months ! I’m hoping there’s a warranty on this for at least a few months
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Gracia

customer_reviews.title: Great bookbag
customer_reviews.text: This bookbag is sturdy, has lots of pockets, space, and organizational features, and the rolling function is extremely smooth. It's also great that the handle has multiple settings and works well for children as well as tall adults.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Robben

customer_reviews.title: Came with star zippers.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 12 year old son and the backpack came with star dangled zippers which was not on the product Picture when I purchased it for his birthday. He’s very disappointed. The backpack itself is great except it’s too girly.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnne

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy if You’re Not Rough On It Like I Was
customer_reviews.text: After one semester of very rough use it’s still going strong. The handle sometimes gets stuck but I think that’s because I’m so tough on it. The bag itself is still great, it’s just the extending handle.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Place

customer_reviews.title: Handle breaks again and again
customer_reviews.text: This is my second rolling back pack for my son that it’s handle broke and came off with normal use. Both lasted less than the school year, 4 month tops. First the shaft just broke. Second the plastic handle came off along with skinny metal rod. Products designed specifically for kids under 10 shouldn’t break the way it does. I wouldn’t buy it again even with a protection plan.
customer_reviews.author: Mei

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, but kinda heavy. I purchased this for my daughter (she has a weight limit that she can lift and carry do to a spinal fusion). It's a little small but does roll smoothly. The quality seems ok, but it's only been used for a week. I don't think I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim  B.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last for even half a school year
customer_reviews.text: Four months into the school year, the telescoping pull rod stopped working. Without a functioning pull rod, the backpack becomes useless as a "rolling backpack". Too expensive, considering it didn't last one school year. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Good item, not sure about price
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be holding ok to my daughters everyday use in school. It has good rollers, and the inside seems to be better than other ones I purchased. All in all it’s a good item, yet expensive
customer_reviews.author: mafesb2013

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is not not worth the money I thought I was investing in something that would get him through the school year and maybe even some summer trips, but it started Having problems going up-and-down right from the start and then statyed tearing and the roll handle broke off within 6 months of the school year.
customer_reviews.author: John Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke after three months :/
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who is eighth grade, and the backpack part is nice and works for him. Unfortunately, though, the handle (one of the main reasons I purchased the product) broke within three months. Its still functional for carrying things, but cannot be used as a rolling backpack any longer
customer_reviews.author: Mmmm Donuts

customer_reviews.title: Great, heavy duty, rolling back pack.
customer_reviews.text: Bag is big and spacious...causing me to forget where I put stuff. Zipper inside main compartment at the back of the bag won’t stay up and I’m constantly having to deal with it. I have to come up with a way to fasten it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D'

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: So happy I found this product! The material is excellent and the colors are beautiful! Very easy for my daughter to use and even carry if needed. Has many pockets which is a plus. Would purchase again and again!
customer_reviews.author: RighthandTati

customer_reviews.title: Usability
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the design and accuracy of the product when it arrived as compared to how it appeared in the add. The book bag appeared to be sturdy and well designed. While these aspects of the product did not disappoint, I was disappointed in the amount of usable space provided. I am not sure how this will effect usability going forward but will most certainly monitor this. Over all I was and am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Michal Jackson

customer_reviews.title: The bag is a bit small for kids with multiple school books. The quality is above expectations
customer_reviews.text: Love the design & durability, not many rolling back packs have full rubber around the bottom. My son seems to wear out the bottom of the bags really fast. Unfortunately for my son’s needs, the bag was too small, but he will use as a suitcase when we travel.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L. Isom

customer_reviews.title: Durable for a middle school student
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great backpack. Rolls nicely. Durable and holds lots of books.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and I love it more! Purchased this to make it easier for my 8 year old to carry all her books and after school activities gear. Fits everything perfect, it’s easy to carry and the best part, it keeps all that heavy weight off her back.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma Choto

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the design I haven't owned it long and as of yet I don't use the wheels and handle but I use this for work and love it!
customer_reviews.author: S Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a backpack that could also travel on wheels. Also, it had to meet the airline's regulations. This does all that and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, sturdy, nice attractive pattern, rolls easily, roomy compartments....durable! My granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: MomNana

customer_reviews.title: Clip on strap broke
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great except the backpack clip broke right when we took it out of the box as my daughter was getting the bag ready to try on. She can still use the wheelie part but unable to wear the bag on her back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This bag has lots of space and sections to keep everything organized. It feels really sturdy as well. Very attractive print.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter back in December and she’s been using it every day since and the backpack is as if nothing. Is sturdy and beautiful, the quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: PinkyPizza

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very tough. I have accidentally backed over it twice, and it still works very well. My daughter loves the theme.
customer_reviews.author: David Burgreen

customer_reviews.title: 4th grader loves this rolling backpack
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter uses it for school. I can’t speak to it’s durability because she hasn’t used it long enough to determine it’s durability. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Tune

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack lasted my daughter a while. She did have some issues with wheels but was still able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: JR Smith

customer_reviews.title: He’s a small guy and he loves the ease for school.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson. It served him well at school. Very sturdy and rolls and packs easily.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this brand to all parents
customer_reviews.text: My 5th grader loves this backpack. I find it to be extremely well made and durable! I highly recommend this brand to all parents!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Cute looking but...
customer_reviews.text: The handle doesn’t feel sturdy, a typical luggage handle would be better. This makes it somewhat awkward to handle and doesn’t allow A looped-over lunchbox to sit still.
customer_reviews.author: jplaynytx

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and holding up well after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6th grader and she has loved it for the first 3 months of school.
customer_reviews.author: mymrbig

customer_reviews.title: Was only good for a short time
customer_reviews.text: The backpack did not even last 3 months. The handle will not retract anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, high quality but expensive to ship to Portugal.
customer_reviews.text: This Rolling backpack is gorgeous and tough enough to handle with kids' manoeuvres. Has plenty of storage also. Shopping to country Portugal - in Europe - was also fast but you will pay directly to Amazon a high fee. They say it is for the Customs, but I never seen in all process any evidence about the effective payment done by Amazon to the Portuguese Customs entity.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Smith Silva

customer_reviews.title: Good size one fit for middle school kid but wheel broke within month
customer_reviews.text: looks like in picture and description, it has been couple of months short walk to middle school everything ok until one day "wheel" cushion broke off ( the tire on top ) now I am you tubing how to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: College book carrier dream
customer_reviews.text: Purchase for my Grand Daughters college books, perfect size, lite weight, highly recommend . Delivered next day!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Exactly what was described. It is beautiful and sturdy! Great Quality :)
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Freeman Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: This is second one that I purchased here .but last one the aluminum alloy rod was loose after 5 month ,but my daughter like this design, so let's try again
customer_reviews.author: mojtaba ghaffari

customer_reviews.title: 8 yo daughterhter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy yet lightweight. Exactly what my 8 year old wanted. I do wish it was just a bit wider, but it works!
customer_reviews.author: Jgoodman

customer_reviews.title: decent but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: It's fine and it's pretty lightweight but I feel it is overpriced
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Londer

customer_reviews.title: Both straps broke after 8 days
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old daughter used this back pack for 8 days before BOTH straps frayed and broke. Terrible craftsmanship. I purchased this backpack because she is petite and needed a roller bag when walking long distances. For the amount of money I paid, I expected this bag to hold up for longer than 8 days of normal wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: AMiles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is the perfect size. All school supplies and the lunch box fit easily! Rolls about easily and the wheels can be concealed when not needed.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy V

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I love this rolling backpack. There are plenty of places to stash my items. I use it for work every day.
customer_reviews.author: Akasha R. Babos

customer_reviews.title: Great rolling backpack. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use this to carry all of my stuff around for grad school. It’s perfect and has held up really well after 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Northwest Super Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Daughter has a ton of books to carry for school. Works well for her. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Takes the weight off your back!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I’ve been using a reg backpack for years but rolling this one is so much more convenient. I’m hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Kay E. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect. My son loves it. Many pockets highly durable and has an amazing look.
customer_reviews.author: Farid m.

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Received it yesterday. My 12-year old son loves it. It's pretty roomy. He was able to carry his chrome book (with case), 3-inch binder, a textbook, and pencil case -- there's a lot of room left to put more things. Overall, it's a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie d.

customer_reviews.title: Excellently made
customer_reviews.text: Product is amazing. Durable wheels and seams. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Mraz

customer_reviews.title: Great back pack for travel
customer_reviews.text: This back pack was perfect. They fit well under seats in front of us. My kids were able to easily wheel around themselves. Tons of room indie with multiple zipper pockets
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy product. Bright colors look nice. Wheels and pull handle work great.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Fackler

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase! It’s sturdy and has practical features (pockets for the straps and covers for the bottom part so when you bring it in the house it’s not exposing the wheels). My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: LJG

customer_reviews.title: Rolling back pack
customer_reviews.text: loved this rolling back pack only thing sucked is that the straps kept coming loose and with in 3 wks of my 6 yr old rolling it back and forth to class they riped off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zipper pulls aren’t as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Warning. They didn’t use the zipper pulls that are in the picture & the silver makes it way too girly looking for what my son was hoping!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very excited about this backpack! She LOVES the print and all the "bells and whistles". I'm hopefully this will hold up well ober the next 2 school years, time will tell. It definitely has the appearance of solid, sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: kristin chen

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP. ONLY LASTED ONE MONTH.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had this for about one month and it broke. Uses it for school everyday. Slide handle came right off. DON'T ORDER THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: kat sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My sister got this for my niece because she has back problems and my niece loves it.
customer_reviews.author: alfredo chalas

customer_reviews.title: Arrived slightly damaged. Not sure of overall quality because returned
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived damaged like it had been used and returned once before: the pull handle was scratched, and scuff marks on inside pockets. Also the item was more light blue and pink than expected: Meaning even though it is a galaxy, less of what a boy might prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Durable but will show wear quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack. The tip lining is already separating from the top handle and backpack. Otherwise, pretty good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Quirky Cutie

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for heavy things, my daughter has a heavy things and this makes it sooo much lighter. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice backpack
customer_reviews.text: Its very well made, very pretty Granddaughter loved it, She is using it for school
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I brought to use for work. I love all the different Compartments. I wish there was padding for my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Teesa B.

customer_reviews.title: Wheels seem good
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy enough so far. The wheels are decent size and should hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Jujubee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: With my daughter’s books for 3rd grade, it’s a tight squeeze. No room For lunch box once her books are packed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Goss

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5th grade son. He LOVES it! The backpack straps are a nice addition!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Rolling Book Bag
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my granddaughter to use as a rolling book bag. She’s been using it for over a year and it still looks new and handles as well as it did on day one. I highly recommend this for any one who carries a book bag that ways more than they do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Really well-made. My granddaughter was really excited to get this as her backpack was so extremely heavy she wanted a wheeled backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Bigdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt happy with this backpack. It didn't even last through the whole school year. The handle got stuck and won't go back down again. Not worth the price. It also doesn't hold as much as I hoped it would.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Blair

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the best backpacks for my daughter Travel size perfect for under the seat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coolness on wheels
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved it! Because of Corona no lockers were issued. Wheels take the weight off her back. And the big plus is that it is “COOL “
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality backpacks
customer_reviews.text: I bought theses backpacks for my kids. They’re spacious, don’t fall over easily, and roll along smoothly. Definitely giving them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: the backpack ripped within the first month of use.
customer_reviews.text: After 1 1/2 months of use, the zipper pulled away from the stitching leaving a hole. This occurred under normal use for school.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Rolling Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This rolling backpack has worked perfectly. My 12 year old uses it for school everyday and it has held up with her heavy books. So happy she doesn't have to carry the weight on her back any more!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Straps will fall apart!
customer_reviews.text: The straps on this backpack with normal gentle usage began to come apart after 3 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Dreibelbis

customer_reviews.title: great stability, it does not fall easily
customer_reviews.text: Great stability, it does not fall easily and it is easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Medas

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Very durable for a teenage boy with lots of heavy books. The wheels are very sturdy. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Lovely backpack.
customer_reviews.text: This was worth the money. My daughter who is in 7th grade loves it. We have not complaints about it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great rolling backpack for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the black/white pattern. I think the rolling handle could be built a little stronger. I use my rolling backpack for work everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Backpack
customer_reviews.text: To carry my Bible and materials with me to Sunday School. Very sturdy and so much help in getting all my things to my class.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product
customer_reviews.text: It is not spacious at all. I'm a college student, and this bag is not nearly big enough. The rod broke within a month. The rod keeps going down.
customer_reviews.author: Cao Yuzhuo

customer_reviews.title: Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Needed to be a little wider. Used as rolling bookbag for school
customer_reviews.author: Linda roark

customer_reviews.title: Greaaaaat!
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack! Only problem we have is when it gets dirty, you cant just throw it in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used this bag for 3 months. The zipper broke, then the handle gets stuck. Just a poor quality bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: maricel arellano

product_meta.title: Tilami Rolling Backpack 18 inch Boys and Girls Laptop Backpack, Camouflage
feature_bullets: Unique Design: remarkable patterns and impressive designs are Tilami's main features
WELL-ORGANIZED: organize necessary stuffs with the differently sized pockets, plenty room for books, binders, keys, cellphone, wallet and so on. Padded laptop compartment fits device probably
Suitable size for all major US airlines
Important usage tip: keep the straps tucked inside the padded back panel when not in use, DO NOT wobble the rod

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars10 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
